DataElement.preferredName: Biopsy Sentinel Lymph Node Alone Prior Neoadjuvant Therapy Confirmed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether confirmation of axillary nodal positivity before neoadjuvant therapy was done by sentinel node biopsy alone.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biopsy Sentinel Lymph Node Alone Prior Neoadjuvant Therapy Confirmed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the biopsy of the sentinel lymph node only (the first lymph node that is affected by cancer spread from the primary site) being confirmed (having been established or verified) before (earlier in time or order) neoadjuvant therapy (treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Property.preferredName: Sentinel Lymph Node Single Prior Neoadjuvant Therapy Confirmed
Property.preferredDefinition: The first lymph node to which cancer is likely to spread from the primary tumor. Cancer cells may appear first in the sentinel node before spreading to other lymph nodes.:Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else. :Earlier in time or order.:Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains.:Confirmed; having been established or verified.

Concepts.definition: The first lymph node that is affected by cancer spread from the primary site.  Sentinel lymph node biopsy is part of the staging work-up to determine early metastasis to regional lymph nodes in patients with breast carcinoma or melanoma.
Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.description: Was confirmation of axillary nodal positivity before neoadjuvant therapy done by sentinel node biopsy alone?
